name: Neeko
title: the Curious Chameleon
shortBio: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be, but those who intend to do her harm will soon witness her true colors revealed, and feel the full power of her primordial spirit magic unleashed upon them.

skins.name: Winter Wonder Neeko

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: An ancient and mysterious winter sprite, Neeko regards the world around her with an almost childlike curiosity. Having recently returned from beyond the Poro King's vast domain, she has become enamored with the civilization that has risen in her absence.

skins.name: Star Guardian Neeko
skins.description: A member of Ahri's original team of Star Guardians, Neeko watched her teammates fall against Zoe's dark powers, going into hiding when she, too, was thought dead. Revealing herself to the newly assembled Star Guardians at the eve of their greatest battle, the wide-eyed adventurer has vowed that this time, she won't run.

skins.name: Prestige Star Guardian Neeko
skins.description: Neeko and the Star Guardians emerge from their battle forever changed, friendships reforged in the face of stunning victory and brutal loss. They will save their lost companion—perhaps not now, but one day—and they will do it together.

skins.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: A kindly god of the Shan Hai Scrolls who remembers her counterpart, Jhin, from before he succumbed to madness, Neeko believes she can return Jhin to the side of good before the painting's magic fades and doom befalls the multiverse, but she knows such an expenditure of power may destroy her in the process.

skins.name: Prestige Star Guardian Neeko (2022)
skins.description: Neeko and the Star Guardians emerge from their battle forever changed, friendships reforged in the face of stunning victory and brutal loss. They will save their lost companion—perhaps not now, but one day—and they will do it together.

skins.name: Bewitching Neeko

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Neeko never remembers to buy a costume for the yearly festivities. Her delightful disguises come courtesy of her transfigurative talents and shapeshifting spells. Wait… are there two Nidalees at this party? Nope. That's just Neeko, pulling one of her classic pranks.

skins.name: Street Demons Neeko

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: An up-and-coming young kappa new to the Styxbridge scene, Neeko is ready to make her magical mark on the walls of this city. Though she is a veritable creative chameleon, able to adopt any artistic style, her own signature work is known for its bright and bubbly attitude, bringing a smile to anyone who sees her tags.

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

passive.name: Inherent Glamour
passive.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

spells.name: Blooming Burst
spells.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
spells.dynamicDescription: Neeko throws a seed that blooms to deal <magicDamage>@ExplosionDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. If it kills a unit or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again, dealing <magicDamage>@SecondDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. Max 2 extra blooms.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Shapesplitter
spells.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Every 3rd Attack deals an additional @PassiveBonusDamageCalc@ bonus magic damage and increases Neeko's Move Speed by @PassiveHaste@% for @PassiveHasteDuration@ second.

Active: Neeko becomes invisible for @StealthDuration@ seconds and projects a clone that lasts @CloneDuration@ seconds. Neeko and the clone gain @Haste@% Move Speed for @HasteDuration@ seconds.

The clone can be controlled using the Move Pet Click hotkey or by Recasting this Ability.
The clone mirrors her spellcasts, emotes, and recall.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Tangle-Barbs
spells.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Neeko slings a tangle that deals @BaseDamage@ magic damage and Roots for @MinRootDuration@ seconds.

The tangle becomes empowered after hitting an enemy, growing larger, moving faster, and Rooting for @MaxRootDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Pop Blossom
spells.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and knocked up. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
spells.dynamicDescription:
After a delay Neeko leaps into the air, Knocking Up all nearby enemies for @DelayUntilExplosion@ seconds. She then crashes down, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

This Ability can be prepared in secret if Neeko is disguised. @DelayBeforePassiveRemoval@ seconds after casting this ability Neeko breaks her disguise.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
